record.title: INDIAN CHILD PROTECTION AND FAMILY VIOLENCE ACT AMENDMENTS OF 2007

speaking.paragraph: Madam President, I ask unanimous consent that the Senate proceed to the immediate consideration of calendar No. 110, S. 398.

record.chair: The clerk will state the bill by title.
record.narrative: The legislative clerk read as follows:

speaking.paragraph: Madam President, I ask unanimous consent that the amendment at the desk be considered agreed to, the bill, as amended, be read the third time and passed, the motion to reconsider laid on the table, and that any statements relating thereto be printed in the Record, as if read, with no intervening action or debate.

record.chair: Without objection, it is so ordered.
